allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add unified tree structure with CloudBench root and PostgreSQL placeholder

Phase 1 of CloudBench transformation:
- Add new NodeTypes: CloudBenchRoot, GeoServerRoot, PostgreSQLRoot, PGService, PGSchema, PGTable, PGView, PGColumn
- Update TreeNode struct with PostgreSQL-specific fields
- Restructure TUI tree to show unified hierarchy: CloudBench > GeoServer > Connections > Workspaces...
- Update Web UI ConnectionTree with CloudBenchRootNode, GeoServerRootNode, PostgreSQLRootNode
- Add icons and colors for new node types in both TUI and Web UI
- Update SPECIFICATION.md to reflect new application name and tree structure
EOF
)")
